title: Drawing, "International Casino: Sofa, Second Floor Niche", June 15, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: 2nd FLOOR - NICHE/TO SEAT 6 PERSONS/COVER:/RED DURALEATHER - #374A; lower right: 8747 [circled]; 6/15/37 1 - BRECKER/ " 2- WEISS - 9/9/37 - OFFICE/8/11 - 1 EMPIRE; dimensions, instructions, materials throughout.
description: Perspective and plan of curved, upholstered sofa along curved wall of second floor niche. Sofa to seat six people; low to ground with small bun feet; armrests on each end. Sofa to be covered in red dura-leather.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Sofa, Second Floor Niche", June 15, 1937.
June 15, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-211.
